title: [BIN] 820-3476 random restarts, kernel panic
message:
No liquid damage or corrosion, crashes when trying to install OSX, random crashes with preloaded SSD.

*** Panic Report ***
panic(cpu 0 caller 0xffffff801bfff2dd): Kernel trap at 0xffffff801bfe3f5b, type 13=general protection, registers:
CR0: 0x000000008001003b, CR2: 0x00007fff9de70708, CR3: 0x00000001f51320ab, CR4: 0x00000000001627e0

16F73

I know this is probably beyond repair CPU/GPU/Memory problem but just thought I would take a crack out of it before binning for parts.. Any insight on the issue?

title: [BIN] 820-3476 random restarts, kernel panic
message: Nope, RAM/CPU issue, this was probably dropped. Unless you have a specific event that caused this then this board is trash.

title: [BIN] 820-3476 random restarts, kernel panic
message:
Sounds about right, into the parts pile it goes.
Thanks for the reply
